languages.text: {n}Молодой сжимается под вашим взглядом.{/n} "Никак нельзя! У нас же просветительская миссия! Как иначе подданные {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} будут узнавать врагов Его в лицо!"
{n}The young man quails under your stare.{/n} "You can't! We're performing a valuable service here — teaching the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s subjects to recognise His enemies on sight!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой сжимается под вашим взглядом.{/n} "Никак нельзя! У нас же просветительская миссия! Как иначе подданные {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} будут узнавать врагов Его в лицо!"

languages.text: {n}こちらの視線に若者は怯えた。{/n}「いけません！我々は大事な仕事をしているまでです。敵を見かけたらすぐにわかるように、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の臣下を教育しているんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The young man quails under your stare.{/n} "You can't! We're performing a valuable service here — teaching the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s subjects to recognise His enemies on sight!"

traits.locale_text: {n}こちらの視線に若者は怯えた。{/n}「いけません！我々は大事な仕事をしているまでです。敵を見かけたらすぐにわかるように、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の臣下を教育しているんです！」

languages.text: {n}这个年轻人被你瞪得退了一步。{/n}“你不能这么做！我们这是在执行有价值的任务！我们是在教导{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的臣民一眼认出祂的敌人！”
languages.original_text: {n}The young man quails under your stare.{/n} "You can't! We're performing a valuable service here — teaching the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s subjects to recognise His enemies on sight!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个年轻人被你瞪得退了一步。{/n}“你不能这么做！我们这是在执行有价值的任务！我们是在教导{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的臣民一眼认出祂的敌人！”

languages.text: {n}El joven se acobarda ante tu mirada.{/n} «¡No tiene derecho a ello! Estamos prestando un servicio fundamental: ¡enseñar a los súbditos del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} a reconocer a sus enemigos nada más verlos!».
languages.original_text: {n}The young man quails under your stare.{/n} "You can't! We're performing a valuable service here — teaching the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s subjects to recognise His enemies on sight!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El joven se acobarda ante tu mirada.{/n} «¡No tiene derecho a ello! Estamos prestando un servicio fundamental: ¡enseñar a los súbditos del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} a reconocer a sus enemigos nada más verlos!».

languages.text: {n}Le jeune homme frémit sous votre regard furieux.{/n} « Vous ne pouvez pas faire ça ! Nous rendons service à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} en apprenant à Ses sujets à reconnaître Ses ennemis ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The young man quails under your stare.{/n} "You can't! We're performing a valuable service here — teaching the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s subjects to recognise His enemies on sight!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune homme frémit sous votre regard furieux.{/n} « Vous ne pouvez pas faire ça ! Nous rendons service à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} en apprenant à Ses sujets à reconnaître Ses ennemis ! »

languages.text: {n}Der junge Mann verzagt unter deinem Blick.{/n} "Das könnt Ihr nicht machen! Wir leisten hier einen wertvollen Dienst – wir zeigen den Untertanen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, wie sie Seine Feinde von Angesicht erkennen können!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young man quails under your stare.{/n} "You can't! We're performing a valuable service here — teaching the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s subjects to recognise His enemies on sight!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Mann verzagt unter deinem Blick.{/n} "Das könnt Ihr nicht machen! Wir leisten hier einen wertvollen Dienst – wir zeigen den Untertanen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}, wie sie Seine Feinde von Angesicht erkennen können!"

languages.text: {n}Genç adam, bakışların karşısında siniyor.{/n} "Yapamazsınız! Burada çok değerli bir hizmet sunuyoruz! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} kullarına O'nun düşmanlarını öğretiyoruz ki gördükleri an tanıyabilsinler!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young man quails under your stare.{/n} "You can't! We're performing a valuable service here — teaching the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s subjects to recognise His enemies on sight!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç adam bakışların karşısında siniyor.{/n} "Yapamazsınız! Burada çok değerli bir hizmet sunuyoruz! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un kullarına O'nun düşmanlarını öğretiyoruz ki onları gördükleri an tanıyabilsinler!"
